plot: The premiere episode introduces the boss and staff of the Dunder-Mifflin Paper Company in Scranton, Pennsylvania in a documentary about the workplace.

The regional manager of a mid-range paper supply company, Michael Scott, is upset and concerned with his immediate superior Jan Levinson tells him that there may be downsizing at his branch. Meanwhile, other employees' reactions to the rumor such as Dwight Schrute, Jim Halpert, and Pam Beesly and unveiled.—kenamwilliam

Michael Scott is the regional manager of Dunder Mifflin, a failing paper supply firm in Scranton, Pennsylvania. Also working there are Dwight Schrute (assistant to the regional manager), Jim Halpert, a salesman and Pam Beesly, the receptionist. It is Ryan Howard's first day as a temporary worker and Michael makes a day of showing him the ropes of the office. Meanwhile, Michael's boss, Jan Levinson-Gould, visits from corporate in New York City to tell him that his branch may be downsized.—Anonymous
